headline: Oil industry gets $1B tax tweak in GOP’s senate bill
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Senate Republicans included a tax break estimated to be worth more than $1 billion for oil and gas producers in their version of President Donald Trump’s sprawling fiscal package. headline: Citi Cuts ConocoPhillips’ (NYSE:COP) PT but Maintains Buy
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) is one of the 10 stocks that Jim Cramer and analysts are watching. Citi cut its price target on the stock from $140 to $115 but kept a Buy rating on June 11. The stock has dropped to its lowest level in four years compared to the U.S. energy index, which has reversed […]

headline: CVX or COP - Which Energy Stock Deserves Your Attention?
summary: Chevron's dividend power and global growth compete with ConocoPhillips' LNG scale and capital efficiency edge.

headline: 3 High-Yield Dividend Stocks to Buy for the Second Half of 2025
summary: ExxonMobil has one of the most reliable dividends in the oil patch.  ConocoPhillips is putting its higher cash flow to work while managing risk.  Kinder Morgan's investment thesis has changed for the better.
